# chemdata
chemical data collections

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/atomse/chemdata.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/atomse/chemdata)
![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/chemdata.svg)

## Includings

* basic atom data
* nist data



## data interface

```python
import chemdata


chemdata.get_spectra_dict()
```
